verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to the \w rebellious|strong="H5637"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w take|strong="H6213"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, but not of me; and that \w cover|strong="H5258"\w* with a \w covering|strong="H4541"\w*, but not of my \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, that they may \w add|strong="H5595"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* to \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*:

That \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* to go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and have not \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* at my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; to \w strengthen|strong="H5810"\w* themselves in the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, and to \w trust|strong="H2620"\w* in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*!

Therefore shall the \w strength|strong="H4581"\w* of \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* be your \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, and the \w trust|strong="H2622"\w* in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \add your\add* \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w*.
For his \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* were at \w Zoan|strong="H6814"\w*, and his \w ambassadors|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H5060"\w* to \w Hanes|strong="H2609"\w*.

They were all \w ashamed|strong="H3001"\w* of a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* could not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* them, nor be an \w help|strong="H5828"\w* nor \w profit|strong="H3276"\w*, but a \w shame|strong="H1322"\w*, and also a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w*.

The \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* of the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*: into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w* and \w anguish|strong="H6695"\w*, from whence \add come\add* the \w young|strong="H3833"\w* and old \w lion|strong="H3918"\w*, the \w viper|strong="H0660"\w* and \w fiery|strong="H8314"\w* \w flying|strong="H5774"\w* \w serpent|strong="H8314"\w*, they will \w carry|strong="H5375"\w* their \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* upon the \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* of young \w asses|strong="H5895"\w*, and their \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* upon the \w bunches|strong="H1707"\w* of \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, to a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \add that\add* shall not \w profit|strong="H3276"\w* \add them\add*.

For the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* shall \w help|strong="H5826"\w* in \w vain|strong="H1892"\w*, and to no \w purpose|strong="H7385"\w*: therefore have I \w cried|strong="H7121"\w* concerning \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w Their|strong="H1992"\w* \w strength|strong="H7293"\w* \add is\add* to sit \w still|strong="H7674"\w*.\f + \fr 30.7 \ft concerning…: or, to her\f*

¶ Now \w go|strong="H0935"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w* it before them in a \w table|strong="H3871"\w*, and \w note|strong="H2710"\w* it in a \w book|strong="H5612"\w*, that it may be for the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* to \w come|strong="H0314"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5703"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:\f + \fr 30.8 \ft the…: Heb. the latter day\f*

That this \add is\add* a \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w lying|strong="H3586"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \add that\add* \w will|strong="H0014"\w* not \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

Which \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w seers|strong="H7200"\w*, \w See|strong="H7200"\w* not; and to the \w prophets|strong="H2374"\w*, \w Prophesy|strong="H2372"\w* not unto us right \w things|strong="H5229"\w*, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto us smooth \w things|strong="H2513"\w*, \w prophesy|strong="H2372"\w* \w deceits|strong="H4123"\w*:

Get you \w out|strong="H5493"\w* of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, turn \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* out of the \w path|strong="H0734"\w*, cause the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w cease|strong="H7673"\w* from \w before|strong="H6440"\w* us.

Wherefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, Because ye \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, and \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in \w oppression|strong="H6233"\w* and \w perverseness|strong="H3868"\w*, and \w stay|strong="H8172"\w* thereon:\f + \fr 30.12 \ft oppression: or, fraud\f*

Therefore this \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* shall be to you as a \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* ready to \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*, swelling \w out|strong="H1158"\w* in a \w high|strong="H7682"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, whose \w breaking|strong="H7667"\w* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* at an \w instant|strong="H6621"\w*.

And he shall \w break|strong="H7665"\w* it as the \w breaking|strong="H7667"\w* of the \w potters’|strong="H3335"\w* \w vessel|strong="H5035"\w* that is broken in \w pieces|strong="H3807"\w*; he shall not \w spare|strong="H2550"\w*: so that there shall not be \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in the \w bursting|strong="H4386"\w* of it a \w sherd|strong="H2789"\w* to \w take|strong="H2846"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* from the \w hearth|strong="H3344"\w*, or to \w take|strong="H2834"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \add withal\add* out of the \w pit|strong="H1360"\w*.\f + \fr 30.14 \ft the potters’…: Heb. the bottle of potters\f*

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; In \w returning|strong="H7729"\w* and \w rest|strong="H5183"\w* shall ye be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*; in \w quietness|strong="H8252"\w* and in \w confidence|strong="H0985"\w* shall be your \w strength|strong="H1369"\w*: and ye \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not.

But ye \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No; for we will \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* upon \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; therefore shall ye \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*: and, We will \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* upon the \w swift|strong="H7031"\w*; therefore shall they that \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* you be \w swift|strong="H7043"\w*.

\w One|strong="H0259"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \add shall flee\add* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* the \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w*; \w at|strong="H6440"\w* the \w rebuke|strong="H1606"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* shall ye \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*: till ye be \w left|strong="H3498"\w* as a \w beacon|strong="H8650"\w* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of a \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and as an \w ensign|strong="H5251"\w* on an \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*.\f + \fr 30.17 \ft a beacon: or, a tree bereft of branches, or, boughs: or, a mast\f*

¶ And therefore will the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w wait|strong="H2442"\w*, that he may be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto you, and therefore will he be \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*, that he may have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w* upon you: for the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* a \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: \w blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add are\add* all they that \w wait|strong="H2442"\w* for him.

For the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*: thou shalt \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* no \w more|strong="H1058"\w*: he will be \w very|strong="H2603"\w* \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto thee at the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thy \w cry|strong="H2199"\w*; when he shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* it, he will \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* thee.

And \add though\add* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of \w adversity|strong="H6862"\w*, and the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of \w affliction|strong="H3906"\w*, yet shall not thy \w teachers|strong="H3384"\w* be removed into a \w corner|strong="H3670"\w* any more, but thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* thy \w teachers|strong="H3384"\w*:\f + \fr 30.20 \ft affliction: or, oppression\f*

And thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* shall \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* a \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* thee, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, walk ye in \w it|strong="H3212"\w*, when ye turn to the right \w hand|strong="H0541"\w*, and when ye turn to the \w left|strong="H8041"\w*.

Ye shall \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* also the \w covering|strong="H6826"\w* of thy graven \w images|strong="H6456"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w ornament|strong="H0642"\w* of thy molten \w images|strong="H4541"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*: thou shalt cast them \w away|strong="H2219"\w* as a menstruous \w cloth|strong="H1739"\w*; thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto it, Get thee \w hence|strong="H3318"\w*.\f + \fr 30.22 \ft thy graven…: Heb. the graven images of thy silver\f*\f + \fr 30.22 \ft cast: Heb. scatter\f*

Then shall he \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* of thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, that thou shalt \w sow|strong="H2232"\w* the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* withal; and \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* of the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*, and it shall be \w fat|strong="H1879"\w* and \w plenteous|strong="H8082"\w*: in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* shall thy \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w* \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* in \w large|strong="H7337"\w* \w pastures|strong="H3733"\w*.

The \w oxen|strong="H0504"\w* likewise and the young \w asses|strong="H5895"\w* that \w ear|strong="H5647"\w* the \w ground|strong="H0127"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w clean|strong="H2548"\w* \w provender|strong="H1098"\w*, which hath been \w winnowed|strong="H2219"\w* with the \w shovel|strong="H7371"\w* and with the \w fan|strong="H4214"\w*.\f + \fr 30.24 \ft clean: or, savoury: Heb. leavened\f*

And there shall be upon every \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and upon every \w high|strong="H5375"\w* \w hill|strong="H1389"\w*, \w rivers|strong="H6388"\w* \add and\add* \w streams|strong="H2988"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2027"\w*, when the \w towers|strong="H4026"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.\f + \fr 30.25 \ft high hill: Heb. lifted up, etc\f*

Moreover the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w moon|strong="H3842"\w* shall be as the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H2535"\w*, and the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H2535"\w* shall be \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w*, as the \w light|strong="H0216"\w* of \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* bindeth \w up|strong="H2280"\w* the \w breach|strong="H7667"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w healeth|strong="H7495"\w* the \w stroke|strong="H4273"\w* of their \w wound|strong="H4347"\w*.

¶ Behold, the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w cometh|strong="H0935"\w* from \w far|strong="H4801"\w*, \w burning|strong="H1197"\w* \add with\add* his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and the \w burden|strong="H4858"\w* \add thereof is\add* \w heavy|strong="H3514"\w*: his \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* are \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w*, and his \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* as a \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*:\f + \fr 30.27 \ft burden…: or, grievousness of flame\f*\f + \fr 30.27 \ft heavy: Heb. heaviness\f*

And his \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*, as an \w overflowing|strong="H7857"\w* \w stream|strong="H5158"\w*, shall reach to the \w midst|strong="H2673"\w* of the \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, to \w sift|strong="H5130"\w* the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* with the \w sieve|strong="H5299"\w* of \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*: and \add there shall be\add* a \w bridle|strong="H7448"\w* in the \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, causing \add them\add* to \w err|strong="H8582"\w*.

Ye shall have a \w song|strong="H7892"\w*, as in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \add when\add* a \w holy|strong="H6942"\w* \w solemnity|strong="H2282"\w* is \w kept|strong="H6942"\w*; and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, as when one \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* with a \w pipe|strong="H2485"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to the mighty \w One|strong="H6697"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 30.29 \ft mighty…: Heb. Rock\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall cause his \w glorious|strong="H1935"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, and shall \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* the lighting \w down|strong="H5183"\w* of his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, with the \w indignation|strong="H2197"\w* of \add his\add* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and \add with\add* the \w flame|strong="H3851"\w* of a \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, \add with\add* \w scattering|strong="H5311"\w*, and \w tempest|strong="H2230"\w*, and \w hailstones|strong="H0068"\w*.\f + \fr 30.30 \ft his glorious…: Heb. the glory of his voice\f*

For through the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* be beaten \w down|strong="H2865"\w*, \add which\add* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* with a \w rod|strong="H7626"\w*.

And \add in\add* every \w place|strong="H3605"\w* where the \w grounded|strong="H4145"\w* \w staff|strong="H4294"\w* shall \w pass|strong="H4569"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w lay|strong="H5117"\w* upon him, \add it\add* shall be with \w tabrets|strong="H8596"\w* and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*: and in \w battles|strong="H4421"\w* of \w shaking|strong="H8573"\w* will he \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* with it.\f + \fr 30.32 \ft in every…: Heb. every passing of the rod founded\f*\f + \fr 30.32 \ft lay…: Heb. cause to rest upon\f*\f + \fr 30.32 \ft with it: or, against them\f*

For \w Tophet|strong="H8613"\w* \add is\add* \w ordained|strong="H6186"\w* of \w old|strong="H0865"\w*; yea, for the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* it is \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w*; he hath made \add it\add* \w deep|strong="H6009"\w* \add and\add* \w large|strong="H7337"\w*: the \w pile|strong="H4071"\w* thereof \add is\add* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* and \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*; the \w breath|strong="H5397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, like a \w stream|strong="H5158"\w* of \w brimstone|strong="H1614"\w*, doth \w kindle|strong="H1197"\w* it.\f + \fr 30.33 \ft of old: Heb. from yesterday\f*
